sources.title: Take Me Back to Oklahoma
sources.description: Wanted by the law...marked by the lawless...betrayed by his best friend...but you can't stop a Texan while there's a song on his lips...and lead slugs in his six guns!

sources.title: Take Me Back to Oklahoma (1940)
sources.description: Storm is out to wreck Ace's stage line. When Tex arrives to help Ace, Storm brings in hired killer Mule Bates. But Tex and Bates know each other and the two devise a plan to fool Storm. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/take-me-back-to-oklahoma-1940/

sources.title: Take Me Back To Oklahoma
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Take Me Back to Oklahoma (1940) TEX RITTER
sources.description:
Stars: Tex Ritter, Bob Wills, Slim Andrews 
 Director: Albert Herman

 Storm is out to wreck Ace's stage line. When Tex arrives to help Ace, Storm brings in hired killer Mule Bates. But Tex and Bates know each other and the two devise a plan to fool Storm.

metadata.Plot: Storm is out to wreck Ace's stage line. When Tex arrives to help Ace, Storm brings in hired killer Mule Bates. But Tex and Bates know each other and the two devise a plan to fool Storm.
metadata.Actors: Tex Ritter, Karl Hackett, White Flash
